Module hu.unipannon.virt.plot

Package hu.unipannon.virt.plot.frame.vertical

The frame.vertical sub package contains all graphical componets of the vertical axis. These items are separated in this package in order to make package level maintenance easier.
The contained components are the following: 
  - The axis lines on the right side, left side and middle of the plot space area.
  - Tick marks for the 3 lines on the inside and outside. These modes can be turned on and off.
  - Tick labels for the 3 lines. The labels can be turned on and off separately.
  - The vertical main grid.
Much like the Frame class, these components are pre-generated upon recieving data and can be toggled.
Author:
Tóth Bálint
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    VerticalAxis
    Base class of the Vertical Axis, it contains all the components in the axis.
    VGrid
    The VGrid class implements the generation of the horizontal gridlines based on the divisor points, as well as contains functions to set the graphical properties of the labels.
    VTickLabels
    The VTickLabels class implements the generation of the tick label objects based on the divisor points, as well as contains functions to set the graphical properties of the labels.
    VTickMarks
    The VTickMarks class implements the generation of the tick mark objects based on the divisor points, as well as contains functions to set the graphical properties of the tick marks.
